question: Do I need a paid TradingView subscription to use the indicators?
answer: No! All of our indicators work on the FREE TradingView plan. Although we love the paid version of TradingView!

question: How do I get the indicators after purchasing?
answer: After purchasing your membership, you will be redirected automatically to our welcome tutorial that will explain how to connect your accounts with the confirmation email you receive after purchasing. After connecting your Discord & TradingView account, you will have access to our indicators under the "Invite-Only Scripts" section in TradingView. You will also have VIP access to exclusive chats & channels in our Discord server.

question: Does this work for the stock market, forex & other markets?
answer: Yes, our indicators are built for use on any chart for any market.

question: Can I pay with crypto?
answer: Currently we are not offering subscription payments in cryptocurrency.

question: Do I get the indicators forever?
answer: You get access to our current & future indicators for as long as you pay your subscription. At the moment we do not offer any lifetime memberships. If you cancel your membership, you will lose access to the indicators at the end of the period.

question: Can I get a free trial of the indicators?
answer: At the moment we do not offer any free trials.

question: Can I win every trade with these indicators?
answer: No indicator, including Paytience's, can guarantee a win on every trade due to market unpredictability. Our indicators are thoughtfully designed and backtested, but remember, all trading carries inherent risks and a past performance doesn't predict future results.
